title: More Wardens against Marauders skins/Make a way to get rid of runes
body:
1. I Love the new Wardens against Marauders skins but i don't play those champs that much... 
2. I would love to seen more Wardens against Marauders because they look bad ass. 
3. I would also love to see a way to just get rid of runes that are taking up space. 
4. Cool champs for Wardens against Marauders {{champion:103}} {{champion:23}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:5}}

replies.body: {{champion:134}} A Marauder for her would be cool, cuz she evil and S**t.
I love the idea of a Marauder Trynd. :3
marauder varus please and thank you
